verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid, neither be dismayed. <S%H2865><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with you, <S%H6965><s%> and arise, go up <S%H5927><s%> to Ai. <S%H5857><s%> Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai, <S%H5857><s%> with his people, <S%H5971><s%> his city, <S%H5892><s%> and his land. <S%H776><s%>

You shall do <S%H6213><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%> as you did <S%H6213><s%> to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and her king, <S%H4428><s%> except its spoil <S%H7998><s%> and its livestock, <S%H929><s%> you shall take for a plunder <S%H962><s%> for yourselves. <S%H7760><s%> Set an ambush <S%H693><s%> for the city <S%H5892><s%> behind it. <S%H310><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> to Ai. <S%H5857><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> chose <S%H977><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men, <S%H1368><s%> the mighty men <S%H376><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> and sent them out <S%H7971><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>

He commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Behold, <S%H7200><s%> you shall lie in ambush <S%H693><s%> against the city, <S%H5892><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%> Don't <S%H7368><s%> go very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from the city, <S%H5892><s%> but all of you be ready. <S%H3559><s%>

I, <S%H5971><s%> and all the people who are with me, <S%H7126><s%> will approach to the city. <S%H5892><s%> It shall happen, <S%H3318><s%> when they come out against <S%H7125><s%> us, <S%H7223><s%> as at the first, that we will flee <S%H5127><s%> before them. <S%H6440><s%>

They will come out <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> us, <S%H5423><s%> until we have drawn them away from the city; <S%H5892><s%> for they will say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5127><s%> 'They flee before <S%H6440><s%> us, <S%H7223><s%> like the first time. <S%H5127><s%>' So we will flee before them, <S%H6440><s%>

and you shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> from the ambush, <S%H693><s%> and take possession <S%H3423><s%> of the city; <S%H5892><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will deliver <S%H5414><s%> it into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

It shall be, <S%H8610><s%> when you have seized on the city, <S%H5892><s%> that you shall set <S%H3341><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire. <S%H784><s%> You shall do <S%H6213><s%> this according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have commanded you. <S%H6680><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent them out; <S%H7971><s%> and they went <S%H3212><s%> to set up the ambush, <S%H3993><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> between Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and Ai, <S%H5857><s%> on the west side <S%H3220><s%> of Ai; <S%H5857><s%> but Joshua <S%H3091><s%> stayed <S%H3885><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that night. <S%H3915><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> mustered <S%H6485><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and went up, <S%H5927><s%> he and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

All the people, <S%H5971><s%> even the men of war <S%H4421><s%> who were with him, <S%H5927><s%> went up, and drew near, <S%H5066><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> before the city, <S%H5892><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%> Now there was a valley <S%H1516><s%> between him and Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> about five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> them in ambush <S%H693><s%> between Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and Ai, <S%H5857><s%> on the west side <S%H3220><s%> of the city. <S%H5857><s%>

So they set <S%H7760><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> even all the army <S%H4264><s%> who was on the north <S%H6828><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and their ambush <S%H6119><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> of the city; <S%H5892><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the valley. <S%H6010><s%>

It happened, <S%H4428><s%> when the king of Ai <S%H5857><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H4116><s%> that they hurried and rose up early, <S%H7925><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> he and all his people, <S%H5971><s%> at the time appointed, <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Arabah; <S%H6160><s%> but he didn't <S%H3045><s%> know that there was an ambush <S%H693><s%> against him behind <S%H310><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> made as if they were beaten <S%H5060><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H5127><s%> and fled by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

All the people <S%H5971><s%> who were in the city <S%H5857><s%> were called <S%H2199><s%> together to pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them. <S%H310><s%> They pursued <S%H7291><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and were drawn away <S%H5423><s%> from the city. <S%H5892><s%>

There was not a man <S%H376><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> in Ai <S%H5857><s%> or Beth El <S%H1008><s%> who didn't <S%H3318><s%> go out after <S%H310><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> They left <S%H5800><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> open, <S%H6605><s%> and pursued <S%H7291><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> the javelin <S%H3591><s%> that is in your hand <S%H3027><s%> toward Ai, <S%H5857><s%> for I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>" Joshua <S%H3091><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the javelin <S%H3591><s%> that was in his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward the city. <S%H5892><s%>

The ambush <S%H693><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> out of their place, <S%H4725><s%> and they ran <S%H7323><s%> as soon as he had stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and entered <S%H935><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it. <S%H4116><s%> They hurried and set <S%H3341><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire. <S%H784><s%>

When the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H6437><s%> they saw, and behold, <S%H6227><s%> the smoke of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended up <S%H5927><s%> to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and they had no power <S%H3027><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> this way or that way. <S%H2008><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> who fled <S%H5127><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> turned back <S%H2015><s%> on the pursuers. <S%H7291><s%>

When Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the ambush <S%H693><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and that the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> ascended, <S%H5927><s%> then they turned again, <S%H7725><s%> and killed <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

The others <S%H428><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> them, <S%H8432><s%> so they were in the midst of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> some on this side, <S%H5221><s%> and some on that side. They struck them, <S%H5704><s%> so that they let <S%H7604><s%> none of them remain <S%H8300><s%> or escape. <S%H6412><s%>
They captured <S%H8610><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> alive, <S%H2416><s%> and brought <S%H7126><s%> him to Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>

It happened, <S%H3478><s%> when Israel had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of killing <S%H2026><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in which they pursued <S%H7291><s%> them, <S%H5307><s%> and they had all fallen by the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> until they were consumed, <S%H8552><s%> that all Israel <S%H3478><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

All that fell <S%H5307><s%> that day, <S%H3117><s%> both of men <S%H376><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> were twelve <S%H8147><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> even all the men <S%H376><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

For Joshua <S%H3091><s%> didn't <S%H7725><s%> draw back <S%H7725><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> with which he stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the javelin, <S%H3591><s%> until he had utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ai. <S%H5857><s%>

Only the livestock <S%H929><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> took for prey <S%H962><s%> to themselves, <S%H1697><s%> according to the word of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> burnt <S%H8313><s%> Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> it a heap <S%H8510><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> even a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

He hanged <S%H8518><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ai <S%H5857><s%> on a tree <S%H6086><s%> until the evening, <S%H6256><s%> and at the <S%H8121><s%> sundown <S%H935><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and they took <S%H3381><s%> his body <S%H5038><s%> down <S%H935><s%> from the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and threw <S%H7993><s%> it at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and raised <S%H6965><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> heap <S%H1530><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> on it that remains to this day. <S%H3117><s%>
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal, <S%H5858><s%>

as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> of uncut <S%H8003><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> on which no man had lifted up <S%H5130><s%> any iron. <S%H1270><s%> They offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> on it to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> peace offerings. <S%H5930><s%>

He wrote <S%H3789><s%> there on the stones <S%H68><s%> a copy <S%H4932><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> which he wrote <S%H3789><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

All Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and their elders <S%H2205><s%> and officers, <S%H7860><s%> and their judges, <S%H8199><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> on this side of the ark <S%H727><s%> and on that side before the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> who carried <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s covenant, <S%H1285><s%> the foreigner <S%H1616><s%> as well as the native; <S%H249><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of them in <S%H413><s%> front <S%H4136><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gerizim, <S%H1630><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of them in front <S%H4136><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Ebal, <S%H5858><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> at the first, <S%H7223><s%> that they should bless <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> he read <S%H7121><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the law, <S%H8451><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse, <S%H7045><s%> according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law. <S%H8451><s%>

There was not a word <S%H1697><s%> of all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> which Joshua <S%H3091><s%> didn't <S%H7121><s%> read before all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with the women, <S%H802><s%> the little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and the foreigners <S%H1616><s%> who were <S%H1980><s%> among them. <S%H7130><s%>
